name: neural-trader-system
title: Neural Trader System - AI Trading Signals, Portfolio Optimization & Risk Management
description: Professional-grade AI trading system with 5 neural network strategies, GPU acceleration, and multi-agent coordination. Generate real-time trading signals with confidence scores, optimize portfolio allocation using Markowitz and Kelly criterion, manage risk with VaR and position sizing, recognize 40+ chart patterns, and integrate with trading bots via webhooks. Supports stocks, crypto, forex with backtesting and ensemble predictions.
seoTitle: Neural Trader System - AI Trading Signals & Portfolio Optimization
seoDescription: Advanced AI trading system with neural networks, real-time signals, portfolio optimization, risk management, GPU acceleration, and multi-agent swarm coordination for stocks, crypto, and forex.
